reapack.name: JBSFX - Spot Media Explorer Selection Through Selected Track and Bake FX into Item (only bakes time selection).lua
reapack.desc: Spot Media Explorer Selection Through Selected Track and Bake FX into Item (only bakes time selection)

metadata.description: Takes the last played file from Media Explorer, trims to time selection, places it on the selected track, and renders it through track/take FX. Only the selected portion is processed and preserved.

version.author: JBSFX
version.source: Spotting/JBSFX - Spot Media Explorer Selection Through Selected Track and Bake FX into Item (only bakes time selection).lua

reapack.name: JBSFX - Spot Media Explorer Selection Through Selected Track and Bake FX into Item (bakes whole file).lua
reapack.desc: Spot Media Explorer Selection Through Selected Track and Bake FX into Item (bakes whole file)

metadata.description: Takes the last played file from Media Explorer, places it on the selected track, renders it through track/take FX, and trims the result to match Media Explorer time selection.

version.author: JBSFX
version.source: Spotting/JBSFX - Spot Media Explorer Selection Through Selected Track and Bake FX into Item (bakes whole file).lua

reapack.name: JBSFX - Reaper Track and Item Renamer.lua
reapack.desc: JBSFX Reaper Track and Item Renamer

metadata.description: A comprehensive batch renaming tool for REAPER items and tracks with a clean GUI interface. Features Find & Replace functionality with options for first/last/all instances.

version.author: JBSFX
version.source: Renaming/JBSFX - Reaper Track and Item Renamer.lua
